# Ignore build output folders
Debug/
Release/
.build/
bin/
obj/

# Ignore Eclipse/IDE settings
.settings/
.cproject
.project

# Ignore STM32CubeIDE specific files
*.launch
*.log

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp
*~

# Ignore user-specific files
*.user
*.userprefs

# Ignore compiled object files and binaries
*.o
*.elf
*.map
*.hex
*.bin

# Ignore backup files and auto-generated files
*.bak
*.orig

# Ignore generated Makefiles
Makefile

# Ignore Core dumps and dump files
*.dmp

# Ignore other IDE-specific files
.vscode/
.idea/

# Ignore system files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
